presentationColumns.name: Opening Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the opening balance of the specified accounts  and can be aggregated by Business Unit, Customer, Customer Account, and Time.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Opening Amount

presentationColumns.name: Closing Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the ending balance of the specified accounts and can be aggregated by Business Unit, Customer, Customer Account and, Time.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Closing Amount

presentationColumns.name: Activity Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the activities amount of the specified accounts and can be aggregated by Business Unit, Customer, Customer Account, and Time.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Activity Amount

presentationColumns.name: Aging Amount - Invoice Date Basis
presentationColumns.description: Shows the aging amount for the open invoices based on Invoice open date grouped by selected aging period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Aging Amount - Invoice Date Basis

presentationColumns.name: Aging Count - Invoice Date Basis
presentationColumns.description: Shows the aging count for the open invoices based on Invoice open date grouped by selected aging period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Aging Count - Invoice Date Basis

presentationColumns.name: Aging Amount - Schedule Date Basis
presentationColumns.description: Shows the aging amount for the open invoices based on Schedule date grouped by selected aging period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Aging Amount - Schedule Date Basis

presentationColumns.name: Aging Count - Schedule Date Basis
presentationColumns.description: Shows the aging count for the open invoices based on Schedule date grouped by selected aging period.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Aging Count - Schedule Date Basis

presentationColumns.name: Total Outstanding Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the outstanding invoice amount which includes current and overdue invoices.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Total Outstanding Amount

presentationColumns.name: Total Outstanding Invoices Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the count of outstanding invoices.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Total Outstanding Invoices Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoice Days Outstanding
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Total number of days invoice outstanding / Total outstanding Invoices Count. This is based on Invoice date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Avg Invoice Days Outstanding

presentationColumns.name: Current Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices amount which are yet to cross the schedule due date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Current Amount

presentationColumns.name: Current Invoices Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count which are yet to cross the schedule due date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Current Invoices Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoice Days Current
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Total number of days before due date / Current Invoices Count. This is based on schedule date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Avg Invoice Days Current

presentationColumns.name: Current Amount to Total Outstanding %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Current Amount / Total Outstanding Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Current Amount to Total Outstanding %

presentationColumns.name: Current Count to Total Outstanding %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Current Invoices Count / Total Outstanding Invoices Count) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Current Count to Total Outstanding %

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices amount which has crossed the schedule due date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Overdue Amount

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Invoices Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count which has crossed the schedule due date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Overdue Invoices Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoice Days Overdue
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Total number of days invoice overdue / Overdue Invoices Count. This is based on schedule date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Avg Invoice Days Overdue

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Amount to Total Outstanding %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Overdue Amount / Total Outstanding Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Overdue Amount to Total Outstanding %

presentationColumns.name: Overdue Count to Total Outstanding %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Overdue Invoices Count / Total Outstanding Invoices Count) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Overdue Count to Total Outstanding %

presentationColumns.name: Risk Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Aging.Risk Amount
